lejos.hardware.port
Interface AnalogPort

All Superinterfaces:
BasicSensorPort, java.io.Closeable, IOPort, SensorConstants
All Known Subinterfaces:
LegacySensorPort
All Known Implementing Classes:
RemoteAnalogPort, RemoteNXTAnalogPort
public interface AnalogPort
extends IOPort, BasicSensorPort

An abstraction for a port that supports Analog/Digital sensors.

Author:
Lawrie Griffiths/Andy.

getFloats

void getFloats(float[] vals,
               int offset,
               int length)
Return a series of results obtained from the sensor. This is currently only used for the NXT color sensor

Parameters:
vals - Place to store the values
offset - Offset into the above array to start storing
length - number of values to read
